header{
    position: relative !important;
}

#page{
    padding-top: 0 !important;
    margin-top: 0 !important;
}

.smartbanner ~ .page-top-search{
    top: 138px;
}

.smartbanner ~ .hdr-mob{
    margin-top: 80px;
}

.nonBorder .is-active,
.nonBorder{
    border: none !important;
}
.nonBorder .is-active:before{
    content: none;
}

.customBtn{
    float: right;
    font-size: .75em;
    font-family: robotobold,Arial,sans-serif;
    /*margin-right: 5%;*/
    margin-top: 15px;
    position: relative;
    color: #fff;
    min-width: 135px;
    width: auto;
}

@media (max-width:991.98px) {
    .customBtn {
        float: none;
    }
}
.customBtn::before{
    content: "";
    opacity: 0 !important;
}
.customBtn::after{
    background: url("clientlib-site/resources/icons/sprites-arrow.png");
    content: "";
    width: 16px;
    height: 16px;
    display: inline-block;
    vertical-align: middle;
    margin-left: 8px;
    position: absolute;
    transition: transform .2s ease-in-out,-webkit-transform .2s ease-in-out;
    background-size: 32px;
    top: 12px;
}

.c-sec-header__left{
    width: 75%;
}

/** Image Shadow **/
.img-shadow {
  position: absolute;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  display: block;
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  z-index: 3;
  background-size: 100% 100%;
  background: url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,);
  background: -moz-linear-gradient(
    top,
    transparent 0,
    transparent 40%,
    rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 50%,
    rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25) 60%,
    rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8) 100%
  );
  background: -webkit-gradient(
    linear,
    left top,
    left bottom,
    color-stop(0, transparent),
    color-stop(40%, transparent),
    color-stop(50%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)),
    color-stop(60%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25)),
    color-stop(100%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8))
  );
  background: -webkit-linear-gradient(
    top,
    transparent 0,
    transparent 40%,
    rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 50%,
    rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25) 60%,
    rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8) 100%
  );
  background: -o-linear-gradient(
    top,
    transparent 0,
    transparent 40%,
    rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 50%,
    rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25) 60%,
    rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8) 100%
  );
  background: -ms-linear-gradient(
    top,
    transparent 0,
    transparent 40%,
    rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 50%,
    rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25) 60%,
    rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8) 100%
  );
  background: linear, to bottom, transparent 0, transparent 40%,
    rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 50%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25) 60%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8) 100%;
}

.img-shadow-top {
  position: absolute;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  display: block;
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  z-index: 3;
  background-image: url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,);
}

}

}

@media ( max-width: 992px ){

    }
}

.content .contact .contact-row:empty{

}

    padding: 0 .625em;
}

.c-carousel-caption .c-carousel-caption__stage .carousel-caption-item .carousel-info{
    opacity: 90%;
}


.breadcrumbs-box {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    z-index: 49;
    width: 100%;
}
.breadcrumbs {
    list-style: none;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 10px 0 0;
}
.breadcrumbs:after,
.breadcrumbs:before {
    content: " ";
    display: table;
}
.breadcrumbs:after {
    clear: both;
}
.breadcrumbs li {
    display: block;
    list-style: none;
    float: left;
    font-size: 0.875em;
}
.breadcrumbs li:last-child {
    margin: 0;
}
.breadcrumbs li span {
    vertical-align: middle;
    width: 9px;
    height: 9px;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: 0 0;
    margin: 0 8px;
}
.breadcrumbs li a {
    color: #1f1f1f;
    text-decoration: none;
}
.breadcrumbs li a:hover {
    color: #f4333d;
    text-decoration: underline;
}

.mwp-html{overflow-x:hidden;}
